qas.question: What was the name of the bodybuilding film Schwarzenegger starred in?
How much time did Schwarzenegger have to train for the 1975 Mr. Olympia competition?
Who co-starred with Schwarzenegger in the film Stay Hungry?

context: Months before the 1975 Mr. Olympia contest, filmmakers George Butler and Robert Fiore persuaded Schwarzenegger to compete, in order to film his training in the bodybuilding documentary called <a0_0>Pumping Iron<a0_0/>. Schwarzenegger had only <a1_0>three months<a1_0/> to prepare for the competition, after losing significant weight to appear in the film Stay Hungry with <a2_0>Jeff Bridges<a2_0/>. Lou Ferrigno proved not to be a threat, and a lighter-than-usual Schwarzenegger convincingly won the 1975 Mr. Olympia.
